title: 95 63 3 "Oh, Brother!""Ace and Luffy! Hot Emotions and Brotherly Bonds!"Transliteration: "Ēsu to Luffy! Atsuki omoi to kyōdai no kizuna" (Japanese:エースとルフィ!熱き想いと兄弟の絆) Hidehiko Kadota Michiru Shimada January 6, 2002(2002-01-06)[n 2][11] March 11, 2006[12][13]
transformers_text: 95 63 3 Oh Brother Ace and Luffy Hot Emotions and Brotherly Bonds Transliteration su to Luffy A tsuki omo i to ky dai no ki zun a Japanese Hidehiko Ka dota Michiru Shimada January 6 2002 2002 01 06 n 2 11 March 11 2006 12 13 Ace fights Smoker while the Straw Hats run for their ship Luffy reunites with his older brother who has joined the White beard Pirates after leaving home and is searching for a former crew mate named Blackbeard who killed a fellow member The brothers take down agents of Baroque Works and Ace demonstrates his Flame Flame Fruit power by destroying several ships in one attack
